text: 39|47|bhūmiyiluḷḷat muḻuvanuṁ atēāṭeāppaṁ atrayuṁ kūṭiyuṁ akramaṁ pravartticcavaruṭe adhīnattil uṇṭāyirunnāl pēāluṁ uyirtteḻunnēlpinṟe nāḷile kaṭutta śikṣayil ninn rakṣappeṭān atavar prāyaścittamāyi nalkiyēkkuṁ. avar kaṇakk kūṭṭiyiṭṭillāyirunna palatuṁ allāhuviṅkal ninn avarkk veḷippeṭukayuṁ ceyyuṁ
